slide.html:
Story

For now I use Linux for last 10 years, maybe a bit more. I tried a various set of distros and desktop environments, as

Distros

  • CentOS (~5 years)
  • ArchLinux (1 year)
  • Mageia (1-2 years)
  • OpenSuse (most of the time)
  • Ubuntu (1.5 year)

DE

  • KDE (episodically during a couple of years)
  • Gnome (most of the time)
  • LXDE (episodically)
  • XFCE (3+ years, as a personal protest against the 3rd Gnome)
